column2: One of the bear cubs we have been raising has become an adult. It is time to return it to the other kamuy.

While our faith has an official head, the faithful may read and interpret our texts on their own to improve their skills, and two different readings of the text may produce different takeaways that benefit the reader.
Though the [Root.Religion.GetName] religion of course is right and proper, it allows for a certain degree of flexibility.
Has a §YCounty§!, §YVassal§! or §YLiege§! of a §YPagan religion§!
Though I do not follow an Eastern religion it cannot be denied that those religions have some appealing traits.
Has a §YCounty§!, §YVassal§! or §YLiege§! of an §YEastern religion§!
column3: A un comté, un vassal ou un seigneur lige d'une religion orientale
column4: Hat eine §YGrafschaft§!, einen §!Vasallen§! oder einen §YLehnsherrn§! der §Yöstlichen Glaubensgruppe§!

column2: Though I am not a Muslim there are certain aspects of the Muslim religions that I find laudable.
Has a §YCounty§!, §YVassal§! or §YLiege§! of a §YMuslim religion§!
